video.title: One Minute Semi-Homemade Money Saving Meals
video.description: Semi-Homemade Money Saving Meals (Sandra Lee Semi Homemade) by Sandra Lee, reviewed. This is one book in a series of books showing people how to make "semi-homemade" meals. As far as I can tell, that describes normal cooking techniques where you use canned vegetables, storebought sauces, or storebought pasta (as opposed to making your own from scratch). Still, I like some of the tools in the book, like a basic pantry stock list (easily modified to fit your own particulars, like brands or level of organicness.)
